mapper.select: select d.id, d.farm_code, d.farm_name_chs, d.farm_name_en, d.feed_method, d.layers, d.rows, d.feed_density, d.h_length, d.h_width, d.h_height, d.feed_purpose, d.corporation, (select a.name from s_d_area_china a where a.id = d.farm_add1) as farm_add1, (select a.name from s_d_area_china a where a.id = d.farm_add2) as farm_add2, (select a.name from s_d_area_china a where a.id = d.farm_add3) as farm_add3, d.farm_add4, d.farm_add5, d.memo_1, d.memo_2, d.freeze_status, d.create_person, d.create_date, d.create_time, d.modify_person, d.modify_date, d.modify_time from s_d_farm d where d.freeze_status='0'
mapper.insert: insert into s_d_farm ( id, farm_code, farm_name_chs, farm_name_en, feed_method, feed_type, farm_add1, farm_add2, farm_add3, freeze_status, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time ) values ( get_organization_id(TRUE), get_organization_id(FALSE), CONCAT(#{farm_name_chs}, '(', get_organization_id(FALSE), ')') , #{farm_name_en}, #{feed_method}, #{feed_type}, #{farm_add1}, #{farm_add2}, #{farm_add3}, #{freeze_status}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

insert into s_d_batch ( house_code, house_name, farm_id, batch_no, batch_date, day_age_curr, count, operation_type, create_person, create_date, create_time ) values ( #{house_code}, #{house_name}, #{farm_id}, #{batch_no}, #{batch_date}, #{day_age_curr}, #{count}, #{operation_type}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time} )

INSERT INTO s_b_devi_house(device_code ,device_type ,farm_id ,house_id ,create_person ,create_date ,create_time) SELECT device_code ,device_type ,#{farm_id} ,#{house_id} ,#{create_person} ,current_date ,current_time FROM s_d_device WHERE device_code = #{device_code}

insert into s_d_house ( id, house_code, house_name, house_type, farm_id, freeze_status, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time ) values ( get_organization_id(TRUE), #{house_code}, #{house_name}, #{house_type}, #{farm_id}, #{freeze_status}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

insert into s_b_house_alarm ( farm_id, house_id, alarm_type, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time ) values ( #{farm_id}, #{house_id}, #{alarm_type}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )

insert into s_b_house_alarm_his (farm_id ,house_id ,alarm_type ,alarm_delay ,temp_cpsation ,temp_cordon ,alarm_way ,alarm_probe ,alarm_sensor_no ,point_alarm ,modify_person ,modify_date ,modify_time) select farm_id ,house_id ,alarm_type ,alarm_delay ,temp_cpsation ,temp_cordon ,alarm_way ,alarm_probe ,c.sensor ,point_alarm ,create_person ,create_date ,create_time from s_b_house_alarm join (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.biz_code separator ',') sensor from (select a.* from s_d_code a where a.code_type = 'SENSOR_LOCATION' order by a.bak1) t) c on 1=1 where farm_id = #{farm_id} and house_id =#{house_id} and alarm_type = #{alarm_type}

insert into s_b_devi_house ( device_code, device_type, port_id, farm_id, house_id, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time ) values ( #{device_code}, #{device_type}, #{port_id}, #{farm_id}, #{house_id}, #{create_person}, #{create_date}, #{create_time}, #{modify_person}, #{modify_date}, #{modify_time} )
